name: Local Graphing Calculator
description: A calculator that plots mathematical functions, built using C++.
outcome: Successfully implemented a GUI-based plotting tool.

name: Local Web Marketplace
description: A UCSD student marketplace for buying and selling items.
outcome: A fully functional marketplace with authentication.

name: Local Custom SQL Database Engine
description: A C++ project implementing data structures like BST from scratch, tokenizing user input, and executing SQL commands to create tables.
outcome: Successfully built a terminal-based SQL database engine with command parsing.

name: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website built using pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to showcase projects, skills, and resume.
outcome: Successfully created a fully responsive portfolio with a light/dark mode toggle and interactive navigation.
